path_a.name: Heavy Ordinance
path_a.description: Focuses on making each shell as devastating as possible in a concentrated area.

upgrades.name: Shrapnel Shells
upgrades.description: Explosions cause enemies to bleed, taking significant damage over time.

upgrades.name: Napalm Coating
upgrades.description: Explosions now also ignite enemies, dealing further damage over time.

path_b.name: Suppression Barrage
path_b.description: Turns the mortar into a rapid-fire debuff tool that weakens enemies for other towers.

upgrades.name: Corrosion Agent
upgrades.description: Shells release a gas that corrodes armor, reducing it by 10.

upgrades.name: Vulnerability Payload
upgrades.description: Shells now make enemies vulnerable, causing them to take 20% increased damage from all sources.

upgrades.name: Orbital Targeting
upgrades.description: Final upgrade. Grants a massive boost to fire rate, blanketing the area in debuffs.
